description: Variation of planning permission dated 18 June 2020 (RN 19/03085/FULL), which itself varied planning permission dated 29 May 2015 (RN: 15/01802/FULL) for the demolition of the existing buildings at 47-53 Queen Anne Street behind retained front facades and redevelopment to provide a building comprised of lower ground, ground and first to fourth floors for a mix of uses including offices (Class B1) on part lower ground, part ground, part first floors and  second to fourth floors, medical purposes (Class D1) on part lower ground and part ground floors,  and two residential flats (Class C3) on part ground and part first floor levels, other alterations including the installation of mechanical plant to new rear first floor flat roof, installation of a quench pipe outlet to rear first floor level and associated works.; NAMELY, removal of conditions 10 and 11 to convert medical floorspace at part lower ground and ground floor to Class E use so the space can be used for offices within 47-53 Queen Anne Street. (S73 application)
